Subject: US v. Maxwell - Proposed RTC and Verdict Sheet

and _ Verdict_ sheet_ cover_ letter.pdf; 2021.11.03_Maxwell_RTCJunredacted].docx 
Chambers, 
Attached please find an unredacted request to charge, Exhibit A to the request to charge, and verdict sheet. The 
Government will file a verdict sheet and redacted version of the request to charge on ECF. As set forth in the attached 
letter, the Government seeks limited redactions on the request to charge, and the defense seeks sealing of Exhibit A. 
Attached also is a Word version of the Request to Charge for the Court's convenience. 
Respectfully submitted, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
New York, New York 10007 
EFTA00018880
